meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fluffy.
meanings.sent1: The fluffiness of the clouds made them look like cotton candy.
meanings.sent2: I love the fluffiness of my favorite blanket.
meanings.sent3: The fluffiness of the puppy's fur always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a fluffiness that reminded me of a soft cloud.
meanings.sent5: The fluffiness of the marshmallows in the hot chocolate made it extra comforting.

meanings.definition: The softness or lightness of a material or texture.
meanings.sent1: The fluffiness of the pillow made it perfect for a nap.
meanings.sent2: The fluffiness of the cotton candy melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: She giggled at the fluffiness of the feather tickling her nose.
meanings.sent4: The fluffiness of the whipped cream on the pie was like a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The fluffiness of the scarf kept her warm on the chilly day.
